str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Bread, a loaf, food. From airo; bread or a loaf.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Body, flesh; the body of the Church. From sozo; the body, used in a very wide application, literally or figuratively.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From meta and echo; to share or participate; by implication, belong to, eat.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Bread, a loaf, food. From airo; bread or a loaf.
